metadata.title: CVE-2023-45919 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Mesa 23.0.4 was discovered to contain a buffer over-read inglXQueryServerString(). NOTE: this is disputed because there are no commonsituations in which users require uninterrupted operation with anattacker-controller server.

criterions.comment: mesa package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
